data.actual_result: The first server you load follows you all over Discord, so you can no longer effectively edit your channel/category permissions.
data.expected_result: You would see the list of roles and permissions for the server you're viewing.
data.short_description: You cannot edit permissions in categories or channels because permissions from another server follows you everywhere else
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have admin/ability to manage roles. - Go to the Permissions tab on a channel or category. - Now go to another server where you have the same access and repeat. - Observe the list of roles in the channel permissions.
